mapper.select: select id, user_id, status, origin_file_id, compare_file_id, create_time, update_time from c_contract_record where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into c_contract_record(user_id, status, origin_file_id, compare_file_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{status}, #{originFileId}, #{compareFileId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into c_contract_record(user_id, status, origin_file_id, compare_file_id, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.originFileId}, #{entity.compareFileId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into c_contract_record(user_id, status, origin_file_id, compare_file_id, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.originFileId}, #{entity.compareFileId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update user_id = values(user_id), status = values(status), origin_file_id = values(origin_file_id), compare_file_id = values(compare_file_id), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update c_contract_record
user_id = #{userId},
status = #{status},
origin_file_id = #{originFileId},
compare_file_id = #{compareFileId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
